message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes packed with features that promise to enhance your experience significantly. Given its quality and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering the value it brings, how about we start our negotiation at $15000?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. Considering the product's features, I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. I believe this is a fair price given its value and my budget.
